exceptions.tactic: intros A B Hrefl1 Hrefl2 x.
intros A' B Hrefl1 Hrefl2 x.
intros A' B' Hrefl1 Hrefl2 x.

exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.

original: intros A B Hrefl1 Hrefl2 x. destruct x. - apply inl_rel_def. apply Hrefl1. - apply inr_rel_def. apply Hrefl2.
